> When calling getThis or getFunction inside code executing in a ShadowRealm, if the receiver or the callee is not from the current ShadowRealm...

When calling getThis or getFunction inside code executing in a ShadowRealm, if the receiver or the callee is not from the current ShadowRealm...

content.body: This is not sufficient, as an `Error.prepareStackTrace` in the root realm (which is a legacy realm) should similarly not be able to access functions or receivers from a shadow realm
